projects.name: VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3! Game Composers of the World UNITE
projects.blurb: The 3rd album from the award-winning multimedia symphonic/rock decade long world touring video game concert event... Video Games Live!

projects.name: Awesomenauts: Starstorm
projects.blurb: We want to take Awesomenauts to the next level, with characters, features, a new map, and more! Join us to make this happen!

projects.name: Drayt Empire
projects.blurb: Discover the Mystery of the Drayt Empire , Follow Ronarke and his friends as you look to seek out the lost forbidden City of Rahland

projects.name: Instant, Mobile, Fantasy Sports.
projects.blurb: Challenge anyone instantly to a fantasy football game through your phone - Instant, Mobile, Fantasy Sports!

projects.name: Stronghold2D - Mass Multiplayer 2D War Game
projects.blurb: Angry Birds/Worms/Red Alert type of Multiplayer game for iOS, PC, Mac, Linux, and Android Devices. Build a stronghold and protect it!

projects.name: Expansion: Capital Ships/Crews in Epic Space Online
projects.blurb: We're adding a new aspect to this MMO set in an Infinite Universe -- "Capital Ships" -- crewed by you and your mates.

projects.name: Icebound: A Visual Novel
projects.blurb: A steampunk, dark-fantasy visual novel set in an ice age. Features an interactive story with mystery, adventure and alchemy puzzles.

projects.name: Magical Todd: In The Beginning
projects.blurb: Join Todd & his friends on a journey to become the most advanced wizards of all time, by completing puzzles using platforms and powers!

projects.name: The Moaning Words - An investigation into the Cthulhu Mythos
projects.blurb: The Moaning Words is a game at the crossroads of books and video games written by Alan Dean Foster.

projects.name: ATKMTN Presents: The Attack Pack - Two rad 2D PC Games
projects.blurb: A spy-thriller. A sci-fi mystery. Gaming opposites collide in THE ATTACK PACK by Attack Mountain.

projects.name: Fishy Feast - The Addicting Family Friendly Game
projects.blurb: Fishy Feast will provide you with countless hours of fun and entertainment. Help a college student by funding this game.

projects.name: Tetrapulse
projects.blurb: Save infinite worlds with the only weapon you have left: your own life force. (PC/Mac/Linux)

projects.name: Hot Tin Roof: The Cat That Wore A Fedora
projects.blurb: Grab your fedora and revolver - in Hot Tin Roof, you're on the case! Find clues and unearth secrets in a noir 3D sidescrolling world.

projects.name: Octopus City Blues
projects.blurb: The authentic Octopus City simulation for Windows, OS X and Linux. A surreal adventure game about everything and nothing.

projects.name: Crystal Arena: a MOBA-like Strategy Game
projects.blurb: A DotA and LoL influenced strategy game with legendary bosses and epic adventures!

projects.name: Neverending Nightmares
projects.blurb: A terrifying psychological horror game inspired by the developer's battle with mental illness. Explore nightmares! Branching narrative!

projects.name: Mysterious Cities of Gold - The Video Game!
projects.blurb: Help us bring the Mysterious Cities of Gold video game on PC and outside of France with quality translation and cinematic dubbing!

projects.name: Death Road to Canada - Permadeath Road Trip Simulator
projects.blurb: Keep your randomly generated survivors alive as you flee cross-country from unstoppable hordes. PC, Linux, Mac, iOS, and Android.

projects.name: PENGUEMIC - Word Domination
projects.blurb: When words become power and penguins rise up in arms, it's up to you to lead them to victory and declare global dominance. PC/Linux/iOS

projects.name: Mighty No. 9
projects.blurb: Classic Japanese side-scrolling action, evolved and transformed by Keiji Inafune, an all-star team of veteran Mega Man devs...and YOU!
